question: My doctor is very vague when I ask him if I am a higher risk of Diabetes.I was diagnosed with Graves over 2 years ago.  Two years before this I was diagnosed with PCOS - I can't help thinking there is a connection - doctor is quite vague when I ask him this as well.My Grandmother had Type 1 Diabetes, as did a few of my uncles.  My dad was type 2 though.Am I at an even higher risk of diabetes, not just because of the family history, but the Graves?Doc reckons PCOS and Graves are not really related.
title: Is Graves Disease, PCOS and Diabetes Related?
